price: 39. Itulah hari yang pasti terjadi. Maka barangsiapa menghendaki, niscaya dia menempuh jalan kembali kepada Tuhannya.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-yawmu al-ḥaqu faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi maāban
